column2: "You destroyed the Devil Castle... This is the Savior of Legend's... No, the Guardian's power."
"The Savior of Cuent, the Guardian. The stories have reached even Verun."
"You all have my sincere gratitude. My name is Melphonsina."
"Um... Is there a problem? What's wrong with my name?"
"That's right. It's not an alias. My name is Melphonsina."

"She appears to be telling the truth.
We can worry about it later."
"And what, may I ask, brings a citizen of Verun here, battling a Devil Castle alone like a fool?"
"The Savior of Cuent. The hero that brought the salvation to the lands of Cuent. The Guardian, <%me>."
"I beg of you, please bring salvation to Verun. We are on the brink of destruction."
